tagline: This little application helps you to keep your Chromium Browser up to date.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### ChromiumUpdater
This application allows you to keep your Chromium Browser up to date.
Simply run it, and it will install the latest version of Chromium on your Windows PC.

### Download and Install
Install wherever you like. It will work.
Requires .NET Runtime 2.0

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with ChromiumUpdater? Create an Issue here:
https://github.com/Eun/ChromiumUpdater/issues
name: Chromiumupdater
